buginformation.summary: header map inconsistent when parsed from input with duplicate columns names
buginformation.description: given parser format for csv files with header line csvformat myformat csvformat rfc 4180 withdelimiter withquotechar withquotepolicy quote minimal withignoresurroundingspaces true withheader withskipheaderrecord true and given file with duplicate header names col col col col col the headermap returned the parser misses entry because the column name being used key leading wrong behavior when rely this not supposed happen the file regarding the csv format least this should raise error not should come with more clever way store and access the headers
